title: Student: Bring back lost answer text
summary: Submitted a form in LMS and everything disappeared? LifeUndo stores entered text locally. Reopen the page — click ‘Restore’. Exams, tests, assignments — no panic.

title: Journalist/Editor: Undo sudden reload
summary: Writing in a CMS and the tab froze — text is gone. With LifeUndo the form is restored from a local safe. No telemetry, only your browser.

title: Office/Accounting: Restore closed tab and clipboard
summary: Accidentally closed a page with a report? Closed tabs history and clipboard journal are at hand. Find what you need and restore with one click.

title: SMM/Creator: Clipboard history for post safety
summary: Prepared a post, copied variants of texts/links — everything is saved locally. Bring the right version back and publish confidently.

title: Executive: Nothing will go out accidentally
summary: Before an important publication or email — GLU has ‘Email Pause’: 30–120 seconds, stop words list, second glance. Reduces mistakes and reputation risks.

title: Gov/Banking: Don’t lose applications and forms
summary: Filling a long application on a government or banking portal — page froze or session ended? LifeUndo stores entered data locally. Reopen the form and restore in one click. No cloud, no data sent — everything stays in your browser.
